body_html: If you have your data in tensors anyway, you don't need to use placeholders and feed_dict. You can just directly use image_batch / label_batch instead of images_placeholder / label_placeholder when setting up your model / loss.
body_text: If you have your data in tensors anyway, you don't need to use placeholders and feed_dict. You can just directly use image_batch / label_batch instead of images_placeholder / label_placeholder when setting up your model / loss.
body: If you have your data in tensors anyway, you don't need to use placeholders and `feed_dict`. You can just directly use `image_batch` / `label_batch` instead of `images_placeholder` / `label_placeholder` when setting up your model / loss.
